name: Macoroni and Cheese
recipe:
for one box of macoroni: 
 3 bags of sharp chedder cheese 
 1 egg 
 one can of evaporated milk 
 salt and pepper

name: Collard/Kale Greens
recipe:
Fresh cut collard or Kale greens 
 smoked turkey necks 
 Onions to your liking 
 salt and peper to taste

name: Fried Chicken
recipe:
beat egg and mix chicken in it for coating 
 season with spikes season all, cayane pepper, and garlic powder 
 coat with flour and fry
